00024 #ifndef __OPENNSL_L3_H__
00025 #define __OPENNSL_L3_H__

00032 
00033 #define OPENNSL_L3_L2ONLY               (1 << 0)   
00035 #define OPENNSL_L3_UNTAG                (1 << 1)   
00036 #define OPENNSL_L3_S_HIT                (1 << 2)   
00037 #define OPENNSL_L3_D_HIT                (1 << 3)   
00039 #define OPENNSL_L3_HIT                  (OPENNSL_L3_S_HIT | OPENNSL_L3_D_HIT) 
00040 #define OPENNSL_L3_HIT_CLEAR            (1 << 4)   
00041 #define OPENNSL_L3_ADD_TO_ARL           (1 << 5)   
00043 #define OPENNSL_L3_WITH_ID              (1 << 6)   
00044 #define OPENNSL_L3_REPLACE              (1 << 8)   
00045 #define OPENNSL_L3_TGID                 (1 << 9)   
00046 #define OPENNSL_L3_RPE                  (1 << 10)  
00048 #define OPENNSL_L3_IPMC                 (1 << 11)  
00050 #define OPENNSL_L3_L2TOCPU              (1 << 12)  
00053 #define OPENNSL_L3_DEFIP_CPU            (1 << 13)  
00055 #define OPENNSL_L3_DEFIP_LOCAL          OPENNSL_L3_DEFIP_CPU 
00056 #define OPENNSL_L3_MULTIPATH            (1 << 14)  
00057 #define OPENNSL_L3_HOST_LOCAL           (1 << 15)  
00058 #define OPENNSL_L3_HOST_AS_ROUTE        (1 << 16)  
00060 #define OPENNSL_L3_IP6                  (1 << 17)  
00061 #define OPENNSL_L3_DST_DISCARD          (1 << 20)  
00062 #define OPENNSL_L3_COPY_TO_CPU          (1 << 23)  
00063 #define OPENNSL_L3_DEREFERENCED_NEXTHOP (1 << 30)  
00065 #define OPENNSL_L3_ECMP_RH_REPLACE      OPENNSL_L3_DEREFERENCED_NEXTHOP 
00068 #define OPENNSL_L3_VXLAN_ONLY           (1 << 31)  
00069 #define OPENNSL_L3_INGRESS_REPLACE  (1 << 1)   
00076 typedef struct opennsl_l3_intf_s {
00077     uint32 l3a_flags;                   
00078     opennsl_vrf_t l3a_vrf;              
00079     opennsl_if_t l3a_intf_id;           
00080     opennsl_mac_t l3a_mac_addr;         
00081     opennsl_vlan_t l3a_vid;             
00082     int l3a_ttl;                        
00083     int l3a_mtu;                        
00084     int l3a_ip4_options_profile_id;     
00085 } opennsl_l3_intf_t;
00086 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */

00093 typedef struct opennsl_l3_egress_s {
00094     uint32 flags;                       
00096     uint32 reserved1; 
00097     opennsl_if_t intf;                  
00098     opennsl_mac_t mac_addr;             
00099     opennsl_vlan_t vlan;                
00100     opennsl_module_t module;            
00101     opennsl_port_t port;                
00103     opennsl_trunk_t trunk;              
00105     uint32 reserved2; 
00106     opennsl_mpls_label_t reserved3; 
00107     opennsl_reserved_enum_t reserved4; 
00108     int reserved5; 
00109     int reserved6; 
00110     uint8 reserved7; 
00111     uint8 reserved8; 
00112     uint8 reserved9; 
00113     int reserved10; 
00114     opennsl_if_t reserved11; 
00115     opennsl_failover_t reserved12; 
00116     opennsl_if_t reserved13; 
00117     opennsl_multicast_t reserved14; 
00118     int reserved15; 
00119     int reserved16; 
00120     int reserved17; 
00121     uint32 reserved18; 
00122     uint16 reserved19; 
00123     opennsl_vntag_t reserved20; 
00124     opennsl_reserved_enum_t reserved21; 
00125     opennsl_etag_t reserved22; 
00126     opennsl_reserved_enum_t reserved23; 
00127 } opennsl_l3_egress_t;

00132 #define OPENNSL_L3_ECMP_DYNAMIC_LOAD_WEIGHT_INVALID -1

00195 typedef struct opennsl_l3_route_s {
00196     uint32 l3a_flags;                   
00197     uint32 reserved1; 
00198     uint32 reserved2; 
00199     opennsl_vrf_t l3a_vrf;              
00200     opennsl_ip_t l3a_subnet;            
00201     opennsl_ip6_t l3a_ip6_net;          
00202     opennsl_ip_t l3a_ip_mask;           
00203     opennsl_ip6_t l3a_ip6_mask;         
00204     opennsl_if_t l3a_intf;              
00205     opennsl_ip_t reserved3; 
00206     opennsl_mac_t reserved4; 
00207     opennsl_module_t reserved5; 
00208     opennsl_port_t l3a_port_tgid;       
00209     opennsl_port_t reserved6; 
00210     opennsl_vlan_t reserved7; 
00211     opennsl_cos_t reserved8; 
00212     uint32 reserved9; 
00213     opennsl_mpls_label_t reserved10; 
00214     int reserved11; 
00215     opennsl_if_t reserved12; 
00216     int reserved13; 
00217     opennsl_multicast_t reserved14; 
00218     opennsl_gport_t reserved15; 
00219 } opennsl_l3_route_t;
